Class OsMoSysFormalismOutFilter

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.filters.Filter

public class OsMoSysFormalismOutFilter
extends XMLFilter

Class to export formalisms in OsMoSys format.

writeToFiles

public boolean writeToFiles(Model m)
Writes a formalism definition into a file in OsMoSys format. setFilenameAssoc() can be invoked BEFORE calling this method. If not, standard filenames will be generated for files.

Parameters:
m - the model to write
Returns:
true if ok, false otherwise

writeFdlToString

public java.lang.String writeFdlToString(Model model)
Writes a formalism definition into a String in OsMoSys format (.fdl).

Parameters:
model - the model to write.
Returns:
a String containing the model in OsMoSys format.

writeRdlToString

public java.lang.String writeRdlToString(Model m,
                                         boolean rebuild)
Writes a formalism definition into a String in OsMoSys format (.rdl).

Parameters:
m - the model to write
rebuild - if true, rebuild support structures. It is useful for optimization purposes: when .mdl has already been written, there is no need to build structures again (so 'false' should be passed)
Returns:
a String containing the model in OsMoSys format
